title: MATH402 Midterm Examination
instructions: Covers Error Analysis, Root Finding, Interpolation, and Numerical Integration

questions.prompt: For the bisection method on interval [a, b], how many iterations are needed to achieve tolerance ε?
questions.explanation: The number of iterations required is ⌈log₂((b-a)/ε)⌉, which ensures the interval is reduced to less than ε.
